CustomField.description:
External Country picklist populated by Chili Piper bookings. Used as a fallback in `Contact Implied Country` if the Account Shipping Country value is NULL.
External Systems Utilization: Chili Piper
CustomField.inlineHelpText: External Country picklist populated by Chili Piper bookings. Used as a fallback in `Contact Implied Country` if the Account Shipping Country value is NULL.
CustomField.label: Country
